A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While seeing all the backlash and divisiveness after this movie\, I have concluded it is a beautiful film that many talented people\, feminist\, etc.\, or not\, have developed. I can understand the opinion of it \"ruining Star Wars\" but it really just opened our eyes to really what it is. I personally loved what they did with Luke and the majority of other characters. I didn't give it 100% because of Canto Boring. Reading this\, you are one of three people. Either you want me dead for saying this\, I didn't praise it enough\, or you're like me and actually are able to see the movie and decipher the grand scheme (not in the movie) but in the world around us. My final message is: \"Let the past die\"...\nOr should you...
